entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:37 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:37 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:37 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
